Monologue.Current: “Задача: захватить низшего стража.{Line} Требуется поддержка сида.{Line} Ты готов?”
Monologue.Original: “Objective: To obtain a low-level GF.{Line} A SeeD member must support.{Line} Are you ready?”

Monologue.Current: “Сообщи, сколько времени тебе{Line} требуется для выполнения задачи.{Line} Но не усложняй себе жизнь,{Line} если не уверен, в собтвенных силах.”
Monologue.Original: “Select a time limit.{Line} Choose one suited to your abilities.{Line} Challenging yet reasonable.”

Monologue.Current: “Objective: To obtain a low-level GF.{Line} A SeeD member will support.{Line} You have {Var 32} mins left.”
Monologue.Original: “Objective: To obtain a low-level GF.{Line} A SeeD member will support.{Line} You have {Var 32} mins left.”

Monologue.Current: “Very good.{Line} You will receive your credits at Garden.”
